actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for daylight savings time during the period beginning on the last Sunday in February and ending on the first Sunday in November of each year.

summary.text: Provides that daylight savings time shall be observed during the period beginning on the last Sunday in February and ending on the first Sunday in November of each year. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 260a(a))

titles.title: A bill to provide for daylight savings time during the period beginning on the last Sunday in February and ending on the first Sunday in November of each year.
